content.query:
USE nyx_taxi_discovery;

-------------------------------------------------------------
--------- Check for duplicates in the Taxi Zone Data
-------------------------------------------------------------
----- for locationid
SELECT
    LocationID,
    COUNT(LocationID) AS 'No_of_Occurence'
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
       LocationID SMALLINT,
       Borough VARCHAR(15),
       Zone VARCHAR(50),
       Service_Zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY LocationID
HAVING COUNT(LocationID) > 1
ORDER BY LocationID;

------ for borough column
SELECT
    Borough,
    COUNT(Borough) AS 'No_of_Occurence'
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
       LocationID SMALLINT,
       Borough VARCHAR(15),
       Zone VARCHAR(50),
       Service_Zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY Borough
HAVING COUNT(Borough) > 1
ORDER BY Borough;

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.rate_code') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.rate_code
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.rate_code
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'silver/rate_code',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
    rate_code_id, rate_code
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        rate_code_id SMALLINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(15)
    );

SELECT * FROM silver.rate_code;

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.payment_type') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'silver/payment_type',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM bronze.vw_payment_type;

SELECT * FROM silver.payment_type;

USE nyx_taxi_discovery;

-------------------------------------------------------------
----- Identify any data quality issues in trip total amount
-------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT
    MIN(total_amount) AS 'Min_value',
    MAX(total_amount) AS 'Max_value',
    AVG(total_amount) AS 'Avg_value',
    COUNT(1) AS 'total_number_of_records',
    COUNT(total_amount) AS not_null_total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];



SELECT
   payment_type, COUNT(*) AS total_number_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
-- WHERE total_amount < 0
GROUP BY payment_type
ORDER BY payment_type;

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;
/*
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.trip_data_green') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'silver/trip_data_green',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM bronze.trip_data_green_csv;

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM silver.trip_data_green;
*/

EXEC silver.usp_silver_trip_data_green @year = '2020', @month = '03'


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM bronze.vw_trip_data
WHERE year = '2020' AND month = '01';

USE nyx_taxi_discovery;

-------------------------------------------------------------
----- Identify number of trips made from each borough!
-------------------------------------------------------------


SELECT
    zone.Borough,
    COUNT(1) AS Number_Of_Trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data 
JOIN OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
       LocationID SMALLINT,
       Borough VARCHAR(15),
       Zone VARCHAR(50),
       Service_Zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS zone
ON trip_data.PULocationID = zone.LocationID
GROUP BY zone.Borough
ORDER BY Number_Of_Trips;

USE nyx_taxi_discovery;

-------------------------------------------------------------
----- Number of trips made by duration in hours
-------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime) / 60) AS from_hour,
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime) / 60) + 1 AS to_hour,
    COUNT(1) AS Number_Of_Trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )AS [result]
GROUP BY (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime) / 60), (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime) / 60) + 1
ORDER BY (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime) / 60), (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime) / 60) + 1;

USE nyx_taxi_discovery;

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----- Identify the percentage of cash and credit card trips by borough
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT
    zone.borough,
    COUNT(1) AS total_trips,
    SUM(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cash_trips,
    SUM(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS card_trips,
    ROUND((CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(1))*100,2) AS cash_trips_percentage,
    ROUND((CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(1))*100,2) AS card_trips_percentage
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data 
LEFT JOIN OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
       LocationID SMALLINT,
       Borough VARCHAR(15),
       Zone VARCHAR(50),
       Service_Zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS zone
ON trip_data.PULocationID = zone.LocationID
JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15) 
    ) AS payment
ON payment.payment_type = trip_data.payment_type
WHERE trip_data.payment_type IN ('1','2')
GROUP BY zone.borough
ORDER BY zone.borough

USE master
GO

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_ldw COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
GO

USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

CREATE SCHEMA bronze
GO

CREATE SCHEMA silver
GO

CREATE SCHEMA gold
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv', --https
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv', --abfss for adls gen2,  look for the position of containor name
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]


------------------------------------------- Examine the data types for the columns

EXECUTE sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'', --abfss for adls gen2,  look for the position of containor name
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'

--------------------------------------------- Max Length of each of the columns

SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) AS len_LocationID,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) AS len_Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) AS len_Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) AS len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv', --abfss for adls gen2,  look for the position of containor name
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]


---------------------------------------------  Use WITH Clause to provide explicit data types

SELECT
    TOP(5) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv', --abfss for adls gen2,  look for the position of containor name
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]


---------------------------------------------  Using Stored Procedure to check the Data Types

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP(5) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
        
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]'


--------------------------------------------- To check the Collations for our Database

SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;


--------------------------------------------- Specify the Collations with Columns

SELECT
    TOP(5) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv', --abfss for adls gen2,  look for the position of containor name
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    ) AS [result]


--------------------------------------------- Specify the Collations with Database

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

--------------------------------------------- Specify the Query for Subset of Columns

-- One Way
SELECT
    TOP(5) Borough,
    Zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv', --abfss for adls gen2,  look for the position of containor name
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]

--- Another Way

SELECT
    TOP(5) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv', 
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH (
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50)
    ) AS [result]

--------------------------------------------- Specify the Query for Subset of Columns (Without Headers)

--- One Way

SELECT
    TOP(5) Borough , Zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]


--- Another Way With Positions

SELECT
    TOP(5) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3
    ) AS [result]

--- Another Way With Positions (Changing Order of the Column)

SELECT
    TOP(5) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        -- Changing the order of the Column
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2
    ) AS [result]


--------------------------------------------- Skipping First Line (Which is Header)

SELECT
    TOP(5) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        -- Changing columns to small case
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS [result]


--------------------------------------------- Create External Data Source

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/'
)

-- DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data;

---------------------------------------------  Query with data source

SELECT
    TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

    SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE calender_data
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv'
)

SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP(10) *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@adlssynnyctaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'


SELECT
    TOP(10) *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    AS Calender;

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'csv_file_format')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format
    WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS  (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            FIRST_ROW = 2,
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
        )
    );

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'csv_file_format_pv1')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pv1
    WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS  (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
            FIRST_ROW = 2,
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
        )
    );

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'tsv_file_format')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format
    WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS  (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            FIRST_ROW = 2,
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
        )
    );

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'tsv_file_format_pv1')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format_pv1
        WITH (
            FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
            FORMAT_OPTIONS (
                FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t',
                STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
                PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
                FIRST_ROW = 2,
                ENCODING = 'UTF8',
                USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
            )
        );


---- PARQUET FILE FORMAT
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'parquet_file_format')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format
        WITH (
            FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
            DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
        );

---- DELTA FILE FORMAT
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'delta_file_format')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format
        WITH (
            FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA,
            DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
        );

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'vendor_unquoted.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS vendor

---- ESCAPE Character file

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'vendor_escaped.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        ESCAPECHAR = '\\',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS vendor

----- QUOTE Field

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'vendor.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS vendor

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------Create Taxi Zone Table
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone
    (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'Rejections/taxi_zone'
    );

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM bronze.taxi_zone;

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------Create Calender Table
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.calender') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calender

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calender
    (
        date_key INT,
        [date] date,
        [year] SMALLINT,
        [MONTH] TINYINT,
        [day] TINYINT,
        day_name VARCHAR(10) ,
        day_of_year SMALLINT,
        week_of_month TINYINT,
        week_of_year TINYINT,
        month_name VARCHAR(10),
        year_month INT,
        year_week INT
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'Rejections/calender'
    );

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM bronze.calender

SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------Create Calender Table
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vendor') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor
    (
        vendor_id TINYINT,
        vendor_name VARCHAR(50)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/vendor.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'Rejections/vendor'
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.vendor;

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------Create Trip Type Table
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_type') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type
    (
        trip_type TINYINT,
        trip_type_desc VARCHAR(50)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/trip_type.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = tsv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'Rejections/trip_type'
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.trip_type

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------Create Trip Data Green Table
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_csv') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv
    (
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        store_and_fed_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount float,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
    );

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM bronze.trip_data_green_csv

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_parquet') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet
    (
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        store_and_fed_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount float,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    );

        tolls_amount FLOAT,

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------Create Rate Code(JSON) bronze View
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_rate_code
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_rate_code
AS
SELECT
    rate_code_id,rate_code
FROM 
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH
    (
        rate_code_id SMALLINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(15)
    )
GO

SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_rate_code
GO


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------Create Payment Type(JSON) bronze View
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vw_payment_type') IS NOT NULL
    DROP VIEW bronze.vw_payment_type
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_payment_type
AS
SELECT
    payment_type,payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
    )
GO

SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_payment_type
GO


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------Create Trip Data Green CSV bronze View
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_trip_data
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_trip_data
AS
SELECT
    [result].filepath(1) AS [year],
    [result].filepath(2) AS [month],
    [result].*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH 
    (
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        store_and_fed_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount float,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    ) AS [result]

Use nyc_taxi_discovery;


------ Single Line JSON usin JSON_VALUE

SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS [result];

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,''$.payment_type'') AS SMALLINT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,''$.payment_type_desc'') AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''payment_type.json'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''1.0'' ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ''0x0b'',
        FIELDQUOTE = ''0x0b'',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''0x0a''
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS [result];'


------ Single Line JSON usin OPENJSON( Far more efficient than JSON_VALUE)

SELECT
    payment_type,[description]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        [description] VARCHAR(15) '$.payment_type_desc '
    );

------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
-------------  JSON that contains ARRAY
------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

--- Using JSON_VALUE
SELECT
   CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) AS payment_type,
   CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type_desc_0,
   CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type_desc_1
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS [result];


----Using OPENJSON

SELECT
   payment_type, payment_type_desc_value
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
    WITH (
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc_value VARCHAR(15) '$.value'
    );

------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
-------------  Query Standard JSON
------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

SELECT
    rate_code_id,rate_code
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'  --- vertical tab
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX) 
    )
    AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        rate_code_id SMALLINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(15)
    );


------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
-------------  Query Standard JSON
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT
    rate_code_id,rate_code_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'     ---- '0x0b' is vertical Tab
    ) 
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code_desc VARCHAR(15) '$.rate_code'
    );

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

------------------------------ Select data from a file
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP(10) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'

------------------------------ Select data from a folder

SELECT
    TOP(10) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',  -----Selecting all csv file in a folder
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

------------------------------ Select data from a subfolder

SELECT
    TOP(10) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',  --- Selecting all subfolders and all files in subfolder (**)
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]


------------------------------ Select data from more than one file

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv','trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03/*.csv'),  ---- giving list of files in BULK attribute
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

------------------------------ Select data from all subfolder and all year, all csv files

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]


------------------------------ File metadata function filename()

SELECT
    TOP(100)
    [result].filename() AS file_name,
    [result].*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

------------------------------ To see how many records in each file

SELECT
    [result].filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(*) AS total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filename()
ORDER BY [result].filename()

------------------------------ To see how many records in subset of file
SELECT
    [result].filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(*) AS total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY [result].filename()
ORDER BY [result].filename()


------------------------------ Use filepath function

SELECT
    [result].filename() AS file_name,
    [result].filepath() AS file_path,
    COUNT(*) AS total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY [result].filename(),[result].filepath()
ORDER BY [result].filename(),[result].filepath() 

------------------------------ Use filepath function to get year and month

SELECT
    [result].filename() AS file_name,
    [result].filepath(1) AS [year],
    [result].filepath(2) AS [month],
    COUNT(*) AS total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY [result].filename(),[result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2)
ORDER BY [result].filename(),[result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2) 

-----------
SELECT
    [result].filepath(1) AS [year],
    [result].filepath(2) AS [month],
    COUNT(*) AS total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2)
ORDER BY [result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2) 

------------------------------ Use FILEPATH function in WHERE clause

SELECT
    [result].filepath(1) AS [year],
    [result].filepath(2) AS [month],
    COUNT(*) AS total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filepath(2) IN ('01','02','03') AND [result].filepath(1) = '2020'
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2)
ORDER BY [result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------  ASSIGNMENTS
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------ 1. Query from folders using wildcard characters

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result];

------ 2. Using filename function

SELECT
    [result].filename() As File_name,
    COUNT(1) AS Total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filename()
ORDER BY [result].filename();

------ 3. Querying from subfolders

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',   --- ** to query subfolders
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result]

------ 4. use filepath to select only from certain pertitions

SELECT
    [result].filepath(1) As [year],
    [result].filepath(2) AS [month],
    COUNT(1) AS Total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result]
WHERE [result].filepath(1) = '2020' AND ([result].filepath(2) BETWEEN '01' AND '04')
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2)
ORDER BY [result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2);

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.trip_type') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_type
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_type
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'silver/trip_type',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM bronze.trip_type;

SELECT * FROM silver.trip_type;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result];

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result];

----- Checking the Data Types

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_delta/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA''
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
       [year] VARCHAR(15),
       [month] VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result];'



SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) 
    WITH (
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       trip_type INT,
       [year] VARCHAR(10),
       [month] VARCHAR(10)
    )AS [result]


SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT payment_type) AS Demo
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result];

SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT payment_type) AS Demo
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [year] = '2020' AND [month] = '01';
SELECT 100;

/* Covid-19 ECDC cases opendata set */

/* Read parquet file */
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases/latest/ecdc_cases.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'parquet') as rows


/* Explicitly specify schema */
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases/latest/ecdc_cases.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) WITH ( date_rep date, cases int, geo_id varchar(6) ) as rows


/* New York City Taxi opendata set */

/* Query set of parquet files */
SELECT
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime),
    passengerCount,
    COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/yellow/puYear=2018/puMonth=*/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        tpepPickupDateTime DATETIME2,
        passengerCount INT
    ) AS nyc
GROUP BY
    passengerCount,
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime)
ORDER BY
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime),
    passengerCount;


/* Automatic schema inference */
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/yellow/puYear=2018/puMonth=*/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS nyc


/* Query partitioned data */
SELECT
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime),
    passengerCount,
    COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/yellow/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) nyc
WHERE
    nyc.filepath(1) = 2017
    AND nyc.filepath(2) IN (1, 2, 3)
    AND tpepPickupDateTime BETWEEN CAST('1/1/2017' AS datetime) AND CAST('3/31/2017' AS datetime)
GROUP BY
    passengerCount,
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime)
ORDER BY
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime),
    passengerCount;
